Name: Verdant Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: What this cocktail lacks in verdant colour is made up by its grassy green favour.
Nutrition: One serving of Verdant Martini contains 146 calories
